title: Monk armor
summaries: The Monk armor is a Hardmode armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 450000*45 [img:Defender Medal] in total, which consists of the Monk's Bushy Brow Bald Cap, Monk's Shirt and Monk's Pants.
A full set of Monk armor provides the following benefits:

• +46 defense
  • +20% melee damage
  • +30% minion damage
  • +15% / +10% melee critical strike chance
  • +2 sentry slots
  • +20% melee speed
  • +20% movement speed
Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the attack rate of Lightning Aura sentries and will cause them to deal critical hits with a fixed 16.67% chance.
The Shinobi Infiltrator armor can be considered a direct upgrade of the Monk armor.
